name: Monolith (itch) (Mad)
description:
Defend your monolith from the never-ending waves of missiles!

Left & Right mouse button to rotate tiles clockwise and counterclockwise.

Metal blocks take far more hits than a normal one. Use these to your advantage!

Powerups can be activated by touching two or more of the same type together.

When your meter is full, unleash your own devastating attack!

There's probably bugs. Lots of bugs.
